CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 23, 1954, page 5, reads: "New Firemen Sworn In - Ten new firemen were added to the payroll this week. Mayor David L. Lawrence, right, administered the oath to, front row, left to right, John J. Berry, Michael Rogers, Robert Abbott, Harold L. Coleman, Vincent J. McMahon Jr., and James L. Davis. In the rear are Albert H. Orsi, Charles M. Stokes, Earl E. Erfort, and David H. Jarrett. - Harris Photo."David L. Lawrence was Mayor of the City of Pittsburgh 1946-1959, Governor of Pennsylvania 1959-1963, and he died in 1966.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of twelve fire fighters, including front row, left to right,  John J. Berry, Michael Rogers, Robert Abbott, Harold L. Coleman, Vincent J. McMahon Jr., and James L. Davis, back row, left to right, Albert H. Orsi, Charles M. Stokes, Earl E. Erfort, and David H. Jarrett, being sworn in by Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence, in Pittsburgh City Council Chambers at the City-County Building
